title: Mariah Scary's $50 Million Halloween
itunes:title: Mariah Scary's $50 Million Halloween
description:
MON 10/31 - On Halloween, The Breakfast Club discusses the scary request Mariah is making of $50 million and a new home as part of a breakup fee from her billionaire boyfriend. Also Soulja Boy & Lil' Yachty keep their spooky beef going and one of them earns a hee-haw for it...

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
